title: プライバシー重視のステーブルコイン「USDCx」、Aleoのテストネットでローンチ
contentSnippet: 仮想通貨のステーブルコインUSDCを発行するサークルは、プライバシー機能を持つL1ブロックチェーンAleoのテストネットでUSDCxがローンチされたことを発表。ユースケースなどを説明した。

title: 仮想通貨市場は政策待ち姿勢　ビットコインとイーサリアムに資金集中＝Wintermute分析
contentSnippet: Wintermuteの最新市場分析によると、仮想通貨市場は米FRBや日銀の政策決定を前に様子見姿勢を強めている。資金はビットコインとイーサリアムに集中し、レバレッジ水平は低位。先週金曜の急落後も市場は底堅さを保ち、質への選別が進む。レンジ相場継続の見通し。

title: Key U.S. Senator on Crypto Bill, Lummis, Negotiating Dicey Points With White House
contentSnippet: The Republican lawmaker who is among the core negotiators on the U.S. market structure bill said the White House has rejected some ethics language.

title: コインチェック、NACの新規取扱いを検討　NOT A HOTELとRWA領域で協業強化へ
contentSnippet: コインチェックがNOT A HOTEL DAOの暗号資産NACの取扱い検討とRWA領域の協業強化を発表。NACの活用や共同サービスの開発方針について解説します。

title: 「仮想通貨市場は次の10年間で最大20倍成長する可能性」Bitwise幹部が予測
contentSnippet: Bitwiseの最高投資責任者は、仮想通貨市場は次の10年間で10倍から20倍まで容易に成長する可能性があるとの見方を示した。ビットコインなどを例に挙げ、根拠を説明している。

title: US Tech Giants Unite to Battle China’s Open-Source AI Dominance
contentSnippet: Anthropic and OpenAI donate key protocols to Linux Foundation as China overtakes US in open-source AI downloads.

title: War Department Launches New Platform With Google’s Gemini in Military AI Push
contentSnippet: Google’s IL5-approved model has become the first generative AI deployed across the War Department as competition with China grows.

title: SEC Chair Atkins Says Many Types of Crypto ICOs Are Outside Agency’s Purview
contentSnippet: SEC Chair Paul Atkins described which types of token sales wouldn't qualify as securities offerings, responding to Decrypt's question.

title: Bitcoin 'After Dark' ETF Would Bet on BTC as Wall Street Sleeps
contentSnippet: The ETF would offer Bitcoin exposure when U.S. markets are closed.

title: Here’s what happened in crypto today
contentSnippet: Need to know what happened in crypto today? Here is the latest news on daily trends and events impacting Bitcoin price, blockchain, DeFi, NFTs, Web3 and crypto regulation.

title: Blockchain trial on Canton Network tests collateral reuse with tokenized US Treasurys
contentSnippet: The latest trial explored multiple stablecoins and showed tokenized US Treasurys can be reused instantly across counterparties on shared infrastructure.

title: Stripe's Tempo Payments Blockchain Opens to Public With Mastercard, UBS Onboard
contentSnippet: Tempo, the payments-focused blockchain from Stripe and Paradigm, is now open to the public following its global testnet launch.

title: Zcash Founder Zooko Wilcox Joins ZEC Treasury Firm as Privacy Coin Surges
contentSnippet: Cypherpunk Technologies stock jumped 40% Tuesday following the appointment of Zooko Wilcox to help guide the Zcash treasury firm.

title: Real Finance secures $29M to build institutional rails for tokenized assets
contentSnippet: Real Finance’s raise comes as tokenization accelerates and institutions push deeper into RWAs, including fast-growing money market funds.

title: Ethereum network sees 62% drop in fees: Is ETH price at risk?
contentSnippet: Ethereum’s base layer demand softened in November, but ETH’s underlying price supports and strong layer-2 growth show the network still has momentum despite a drop in fees and TVL.

title: Proposed ‘AfterDark’ Bitcoin ETF Would Skip U.S. Trading Hours
contentSnippet: The fund would hold bitcoin only overnight, betting on data showing bitcon gains mostly occur outside regular market hours.

title: New ETF proposal bets Bitcoin returns are made after hours
contentSnippet: ETF analyst Eric Balchuas said there was a chance that such an investment vehicle “could put up better [returns]” based on BTC price moves after trading hours.

title: US bank regulator clears national banks to facilitate crypto transactions
contentSnippet: The guidance confirms that facilitating customer crypto trades falls within the “business of banking,” expanding the range of activities that national banks may offer under existing law.

title: JPMorgan Analysts Doubt Crypto Winter Is Coming, Despite 'Meaningful' Bitcoin Sell-Off
contentSnippet: The investment bank continues to have a positive outlook on the crypto market, even with Bitcoin and other assets down.

title: XRP Underperforms Market as Sudden Bitcoin Surge Forces $387M of Liquidations
contentSnippet: XRP's technical outlook remains uncertain, with support at $2.05 and resistance at $2.17, as traders watch for volume expansion

title: Dogecoin Surges as Ether Zooms 8%, Sparking Bullish Reversal For Memecoins
contentSnippet: The breakout now sets up a clean continuation zone—provided bulls defend the mid-range pivot they just reclaimed.

title: Senator Booker: Low Odds for Crypto Bill Without Democrats Appointed at CFTC, SEC
contentSnippet: The Senate Democrat, who is leading negotiations on a crypto market structure bill, said promises from the White House on the escalating issue would not be enough.

title: Aptos Rises 8% After Breaking Through $1.80 Resistance
contentSnippet: Strong volume and technical momentum distinguished APT's gains from the broader market action.

title: UK crypto lobbying group joins Digital Chamber in cross-border policy push
contentSnippet: The partnership between the two advocacy groups was the latest move in efforts by US and UK policymakers to work closer together on crypto regulation.

title: Ether Surges 8%, Outpacing Bitcoin Gains Amid Staking ETF, Tokenization Optimism
contentSnippet: BlackRock's filing for a staking ether ETF earlier this week has contributed to ETH's relative strength to bitcoin, one market strategist noted.

title: Bitcoin’s back above $94K: Is the BTC bull run back on?
contentSnippet: Bitcoin bulls recaptured the $94,000 level, but BTC volume data raises doubts about the duration of the upmove. Will bulls provide the necessary momentum?

title: Privacy-Centric Version of Circle's USDC Stablecoin Rolling Out via Aleo Network
contentSnippet: A new privacy-focused stablecoin powered by Circle's xReserve platform is launching on the testnet of layer-1 blockchain, Aleo.

title: Bitwise crypto index fund moves from over-the-counter to NYSE Arca for trading
contentSnippet: Bitwise’s crypto index fund moves from OTC markets to NYSE Arca, marking another step in bringing diversified digital asset products onto regulated exchanges.

title: PNC Bank launches Bitcoin trading for eligible clients via Coinbase integration
contentSnippet: The move makes PNC the first major US bank to offer spot Bitcoin trading within its own digital platform, starting with private bank clients.

title: What a $440,000 Hack Shows About the Rising Threat of Ethereum 'Permit Scams'
contentSnippet: A single mistake cost one user nearly half a million dollars, highlighting how scammers are escalating phishing attacks.

title: SEC Approves U.S.’ Second Crypto Index ETP with Bitwise’s BITW
contentSnippet: The Bitwise 10 Crypto Index Fund now trades on NYSE Arca, joining the ranks of gold and oil funds in regulated exchange products.

title: Michael Saylor Urges Middle East to Become the 'Switzerland of Bitcoin Banking'
contentSnippet: The executive chairman of Strategy pitched BTC-backed banking and yield products as a $200 trillion opportunity at the Bitcoin MENA conference.

title: Cascade Unveils 24/7 Neo-Brokerage Offering Perpetuals on Cryptos, U.S. Stocks
contentSnippet: The platform will let retail traders use one margin account to trade round-the-clock perpetual markets.

title: Bitcoin Surges to $94K One Day Ahead of Expected Fed Rate Cut
contentSnippet: The change from what's become typical bearish U.S. session action could signal seller exhaustion.

title: リミックスポイント、エネルギー事業の中期経営計画を発表　3年で営業利益3.7倍目指す
contentSnippet: リミックスポイントが2027-2029年度の中期経営計画を発表。エネルギー・蓄電事業で売上高692億円、営業利益91億円を目指す。日本蓄電池と提携し系統用蓄電所7カ所を共同運営。同社は242億円超の仮想通貨も保有し、多角的な事業展開を推進。

title: 補正予算の国会質疑で仮想通貨税制が議題に　国民民主党が質問、高市首相は「与党税調で検討中」と答弁
contentSnippet: 補正予算の国会質疑で暗号資産（仮想通貨）税制が議題に。国民民主党は雑所得として最高税率55%が適用される現行制度を見直し、分離課税化を要求。高市首相は税制改正大綱に基づき与党税調で検討を進めていると答弁した。

title: 米XRP現物ETF、全期間で純流入を記録　約1459億円に到達
contentSnippet: 米XRP現物ETFが上場以来全期間で純流入を記録し、約1,459億円に到達。仮想通貨ETF史上2番目の速さで8億ドルを突破し、機関投資家の継続的な買いが続いている

title: カナダ税務当局、仮想通貨利用者の4割が未申告と推定
contentSnippet: カナダ歳入庁が過去3年間で仮想通貨関連監査により1億カナダドル以上を徴収したが、2020年以降刑事告発は行われていない。同庁は仮想通貨プラットフォーム利用者の40%が未申告または高リスクだと推定している。

title: 『ガス先物市場』、ヴィタリックがイーサリアム手数料を安定させるアイデアを披露
contentSnippet: 仮想通貨イーサリアムの共同創設者ヴィタリック・ブテリン氏がガス代先物市場を提案した。将来の手数料をヘッジ可能にする構想であり、コミュニティ内で議論が活発化している。

title: XRPの買い方｜おすすめ取引所と購入手順を図解【初心者向け】
contentSnippet: 暗号資産（仮想通貨）XRPの特徴から買い方、将来性、リップル社の最新動向や取引所の選び方も紹介します。ドナルド・トランプ次期米大統領の思惑やSECゲンスラー委員長交代による規制環境の変化、価格への影響を分析。
